item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Just for Fun. No (67 points | 15 comments)
2. Radiology specific foundation model released by Harrison.ai (67 points | 9 comments)
3. An NFC Movie Library for My Kids (362 points | 63 comments)
4. Affordable DE10-Nano compatible boards for MiSTer FPGA retro platform (57 points | 10 comments)
5. Windows NT vs. Unix: A design comparison (349 points | 271 comments)
6. Synthetic diamonds are now purer, more beautiful, and cheaper than mined (533 points | 325 comments)
7. DOJ claims Google has "trifecta of monopolies" on Day 1 of ad tech trial (152 points | 82 comments)
8. iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max (449 points | 1151 comments)
9. Sigrok – a portable, cross-platform, FOSS signal analysis software suite (61 points | 1 comment)
10. Project Hammer: reduce collusion in the Canadian grocery sector (270 points | 180 comments)
11. Launch HN: Deepsilicon (YC S24) – Software and hardware for ternary transformers (150 points | 54 comments)
12. Carpentopod: A Walking Table Project (111 points | 14 comments)
13. Gdi.js: JavaScript Runtime Written in Object Pascal (20 points | 1 comment)
14. API Complexity Is a Lie (13 points | 4 comments)
15. Sqlc: Compile SQL to type-safe code (93 points | 41 comments)
16. B-Trees and Database Indexes (181 points | 32 comments)
17. Litecli: CLI for SQLite Databases with auto-completion and syntax highlighting (61 points | 8 comments)
18. Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin discovered that stars are mostly made of hydrogen (49 points | 12 comments)
19. Transfusion: Predict the next token and diffuse images with one multimodal model (80 points | 5 comments)
20. Why GitHub won (428 points | 370 comments)
21. Talaria: Interactively Optimizing Machine Learning Models for Efficient Inferenc (19 points | discuss)
22. Firefox update added more sponsored content on new-tab page (22 points | 1 comment)
23. Estimating Bidders' Valuation Distributions in Online Auctions (2005) [pdf] (4 points | discuss)
24. Hacking misconfigured AWS S3 buckets: A complete guide (176 points | 34 comments)
25. PSA: Eget That Executable from GitHub (29 points | 14 comments)
26. Every webpage deserves to be a place (79 points | 24 comments)
27. FTC Pushed to Crack Down on Companies That Ruin Hardware via Software Updates (301 points | 113 comments)
28. Show HN: I mapped HN's favorite books with GPT-4o (216 points | 47 comments)
29. James Earl Jones has died (545 points | 149 comments)
30. Oxygene: A modern language built on the foundation of Object Pascal (81 points | 24 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
